About Us

Cormed Clinic officially opened its doors in October 1992 as a 20 bed day clinic. The initiative was led by the late Dr. Corrie Lategan in collaboration with several shareholders.

As Cormed became a hospital of choice for patients, physicians, and specialists, the healthcare needs of the community increased, and several expansions were inevitable.

Cormed Clinic now offers medical and surgical wards, a ICU and High Care unit, a Maternity ward, and Casualty department.

Our hospital has consistently provided exceptional care and service that families have relied on for generations, even in the face of challenges and changes.

The success of our hospital is due to our dedicated, passionate, and committed employees, shareholders, and physicians.

"The heart of Cormed Private Hospital lies within its people." - Dr. P.J. Lategan.
